name: Hidden Hunt
description:
This is Hidden Hunt, and your goal is simple: find all the hidden objects to reveal the mystery! If you’re a fan of hidden object games, grab your phone and immerse yourself in the adventure-seeking world.

How to play:
1. Look through the list of objects you need to find.
2. Inspect the scene for any familiar shape.
3. Found one? No more time to lose, tap it immediately!

Move through the levels by solving endless puzzles and finding hidden objects!

FEATURES
- Exciting gameplay
- Stunning scenes
- Hidden objects of any kind
- Hints in case you get stuck

Time to search and find all the hidden objects in this game!
